HotelElement.Name: La Manga Club Las Lomas Village

Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Las Lomas Village in Cartagena (Los Belones), you'll be within the vicinity of Alcazaba Zoco. This 4-star hotel is within the region of Lighthouse of Cabo de Palos and Cartagena Bull Ring.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 230 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones, and both cribs/infant beds (complimentary) and rollaway/extra beds (surcharge) are available on request.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. After practicing your swing on the golf course, you can dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Las Lomas Village.

Business, Other Amenities
Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Las Lomas Village.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Alcazaba Zoco - 9.8 km / 6.1 mi
Lighthouse of Cabo de Palos - 11 km / 6.8 mi
Cartagena Bull Ring - 14.9 km / 9.3 mi
Castillo de la Concepcion - 15.1 km / 9.4 mi
Port of Cartagena - 15.1 km / 9.4 mi
Roman Theater - 15.3 km / 9.5 mi
Santa Maria de Gracia Church - 15.4 km / 9.6 mi
Puerto Deportivo Tomas Maestre - 15.9 km / 9.9 mi
Naval Museum - 16 km / 9.9 mi
Archaelogical Museum - 16.1 km / 10 mi
Estadio Municipal de Cartagena - 16.4 km / 10.2 mi
Salt Marshes of San Pedro del Pinatar Regional Park - 24.1 km / 15 mi
Mirador Los Castillitos - 28.3 km / 17.6 mi
Bolnuevo Beach - 44.4 km / 27.6 mi
Murcia Bull Ring - 49.8 km / 31 mi

The preferred airport for Las Lomas Village is Murcia (MJV-San Javier) - 18.3 km / 11.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
